entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
